com.ibm.team.repository.client
Interface IDownloadHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
DownloadAdapter, OutputDownloadAdapter
public interface IDownloadHandler

Accepts events regarding a download being managed by a IContentManagerSession.

Since:
0.5

Method Summary
 void downloadCanceled(IContent content)
          Called when the download has been canceled.
 void downloadCompleted(IContent content)
          Called when the download has been completed.
 void downloadFailed(IContent content, TeamRepositoryException e)
          Called when the download fails.
 void downloadStart(IContent content)
          Called when the download starts.
 void downloadStreamAcquired(IContent content, java.io.InputStream in)
          Called when an input stream has been acquired for the download.
 

Method Detail

downloadCanceled

void downloadCanceled(IContent content)
                      throws TeamRepositoryException
Called when the download has been canceled.

Throws:
TeamRepositoryException

downloadStart

void downloadStart(IContent content)
                   throws TeamRepositoryException
Called when the download starts.

Parameters:
content - The content being downloaded. As supplied by the caller to IContentManagerSession.retrieveContent(IContent,IDownloadHandler).
Throws:
TeamRepositoryException

downloadStreamAcquired

void downloadStreamAcquired(IContent content,
                            java.io.InputStream in)
                            throws TeamRepositoryException
Called when an input stream has been acquired for the download.

Throws:
TeamRepositoryException

downloadCompleted

void downloadCompleted(IContent content)
                       throws TeamRepositoryException
Called when the download has been completed. Note that the last call to streamAcquiredEvent(InputStream) will complete before this method is called.

Throws:
TeamRepositoryException

downloadFailed

void downloadFailed(IContent content,
                    TeamRepositoryException e)
Called when the download fails.

Parameters:
content - The content being downloaded. As supplied by the caller to IContentManagerSession.retrieveContent(IContent,IDownloadHandler).
e - The failure. May have wrapped exceptions.
